Class ConnectingState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.client.state.ClientControllerState
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.client.state.ConnectingState
public class ConnectingState extends ClientControllerState
Represents the state of the client during the process of connecting to the game server.

    • ConnectingState

      public ConnectingState(ClientController controller, ClientView view, String username)
      Constructs a ConnectingState object.
      Parameters:
      controller - ClientController Controller to which this state is tied to.
      view - ClientView View to which this state is tied to.
      username - Username with which the client wishes to connect to the server.

      public void connect(String address, int port, ConnectionType type)
      Connects to a remote game server using the provided info and transitions.
      Parameters:
      address - Address on which the server is running.
      port - Port on which the server is listening.
      type - ConnectionType Protocol to be used.
